body: Hi Andrea, It is strange indeed. I have no idea why the output for HOY is empty in your image. It shouldn't be. I downloaded and tested it for Milan and it works fine on my system. The only other suggestion I have is to change the working directory. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/m5DCNqwNmKY2wHnBvTCA7tHY6VoaulJSLfMx1nP2yPzcP14v6LDqz4Y3-aCop*YyMyDz-Scwzaqg8IRivNZ6wBGIZF-x5gpV/selectSkyMtx_Milan.png) Do you have reading/writing access to C drive? Something goes wrong with genCumulativeSky component. It is either an issue with downloading gendaymtx.exe or with running the batch file. Do you see a batch file similar like this pop up and stay for a minute or so? [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/m5DCNqwNmKbXxRT9WijBZCtJG2YkzgqEQbG3cjwUk0vg1lRyH7Fl-WA2o5IbklQmqvEVaekaTNOIeCPlvhYEfjRAYDO9D0b0/gendaymtx.jpg)
